IMDb data; ttnr: 0230030, Title: Bedazzled, --- Description: Bedazzled: Directed by Harold Ramis. With Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances O'Connor, Miriam Shor. Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0230030/","name":"Bedazzled","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgxOTg5OGUtOWViMC00NjM5LWEyMTQtN2M4NTBjYWUzOWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0230030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pachl","dateCreated":"2006-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A comedy with warmth, wit, and style","reviewBody":"I originally saw this movie because it stars Brendan Fraser, an actor who can't seem to make a bad movie, and often makes great movies, such as "Blast From the Past".

The big surprise was Elizabeth Hurley. As certain as Vivien Leigh was meant to play Scarlett O'Hara, no one could have done a better job playing The Devil...in this case a sly, brilliantly cunning, sexy devil who playfully torments Brendan by dooming each of his wishes with unintended, nasty surprises. She effortlessly leads him along like a puppy dog on a leash.

Besides her comedic wit, (and some clever writing) I would be remiss not to mention that Elizabeth Hurley looks perfect, absolutely perfect, in every scene. Her clipped, refined British accent is the aural equivalent of a film shot on Kodachrome.

Bedazzled exudes a positive, good-natured warmth, and is proof that comedy doesn't have to depend on silly sophomoric antics, pratfalls, or foul language.

ADDENDUM January 10, 2008. After two years, I have no idea if anyone has ever read this review. Even if you don't like it, please give me a thumbs up or thumbs down, just to let me know someone read it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100866,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-31","keywords":"gay,john wilkes booth character,soul,devil,dream","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bedazzled","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2293825817","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NjNDI0NTItNjQxYi00YTk2LWFhZTgtODc2YTg4YmY3YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NjNDI0NTItNjQxYi00YTk2LWFhZTgtODc2YTg4YmY3YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000409/","name":"Brendan Fraser","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000167/","name":"Elizabeth Hurley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0640323/","name":"Frances O'Connor"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017013/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177228/","name":"Peter Cook","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001545/","name":"Dudley Moore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312205/","name":"Larry Gelbart"],"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

Ukryty wymiar
Event Horizon
programme.desc:
Event Horizon: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson. A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119081/","name":"Event Horizon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI0NDMwNjAtNGEzNC00MzA1LTlkMjQtYjBkYTZlZjAyZWEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119081/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BradleyUK"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sci-Fi Shock sensation","reviewBody":"Its not the best film I've seen yet this was the best experience I've had in a cinema. After getting lost & sh*t scared driving around dark English country lanes I arrived at the cinema already in quite a state. And from the moment I heard the rocking Orbital opening track I was transfixed. I was in the perfect mood to watch this film and it delivered more than I could have hoped in a cinema experience. After repeated home viewings it does lose its shock factor yet it is still a great film, though I have to add it really was meant for the big screen. The sets are great, the gore is shocking & the ship design is truly beautiful. Admittedly the Event Horizon borrowed its look from '2001' yet they took that long majestic shape & gave it a more modern gritty feel. A few bits of ham acting (listen to when Richardson says "the hulls been breached") didn't detract from this excellent Hellraiser Vs 2001 style flic. Watch it with the lights off and the sound up. 

10/10 for the Cinema experience. 

8.5/10 as a complete film","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":169784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-08-15","keywords":"spaceship,astronaut,black hole,hell,female astronaut","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Event Horizon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1179583001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JjYzFiOWUtZjk1Ny00YzIwLThiMzQtODhmNDAzMDkwYWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JjYzFiOWUtZjk1Ny00YzIwLThiMzQtODhmNDAzMDkwYWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000554/","name":"Sam Neill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000599/","name":"Kathleen Quinlan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. programme.title: Saw 3D
Piła 3D
Saw 3D
programme.desc: Saw 3D: Directed by Kevin Greutert. With Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Betsy Russell, Cary Elwes. As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1477076/","name":"Saw 3D","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NTEwNTgwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM5MTU5Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1477076/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88"},"dateCreated":"2010-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"there isn't much if anything left to add","reviewBody":"In keeping with the annual Halloween tradition, producers decided to bring audiences this allegedly final installment of the unsettling series, and apparently wanted to go out in style with what has fast become an overused technique in three-dimensional effects. The "story" centers around a self-help author who purportedly survived the deceased Jigsaw's deadly game, and now tries to preach a message of strength to those around him. His newfound strength is put to the test however when he becomes the target of a new game, one which will also determine the fate of those close to him. Meanwhile, the cold-blooded Detective Hoffman tries to settle a score while evading the dogged pursuit of his fellow officers. After so many films, so many traps, so much relentless violence and gore, it would be pointless to complain about the film's content, but beyond a few startling 3-D moments, and despite a relatively short running time, the whole thing feels like a prolonged, protracted, and downright boring exercise in this tired genre. Tries to wrap things up nice and neatly in the end, yet still can't hide the fact that this series has long run out of steam, or that this project is clearly uninspired. *½"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95447,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-10-27","keywords":"sequel,gore,female police officer,tied to a chair,husband wife relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw 3D: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi965151001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNzg2OTE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTAwNTc4Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNzg2OTE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTAwNTc4Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Saw 3D: Trailer #2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068551/","name":"Tobin Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541908/","name":"Costas Mandylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751018/","name":"Betsy Russell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0340436/","name":"Kevin Greutert"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247116/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247116/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733317/","name":"Patrick Melton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729303/","name":"Marcus Dunstan"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1477076, Title: Saw 3D, --- Description: Saw 3D: Directed by Kevin Greutert. With Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Betsy Russell, Cary Elwes. As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1477076/","name":"Saw 3D","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NTEwNTgwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM5MTU5Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1477076/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88","dateCreated":"2010-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"there isn't much if anything left to add","reviewBody":"In keeping with the annual Halloween tradition, producers decided to bring audiences this allegedly final installment of the unsettling series, and apparently wanted to go out in style with what has fast become an overused technique in three-dimensional effects. The "story" centers around a self-help author who purportedly survived the deceased Jigsaw's deadly game, and now tries to preach a message of strength to those around him. His newfound strength is put to the test however when he becomes the target of a new game, one which will also determine the fate of those close to him. Meanwhile, the cold-blooded Detective Hoffman tries to settle a score while evading the dogged pursuit of his fellow officers. After so many films, so many traps, so much relentless violence and gore, it would be pointless to complain about the film's content, but beyond a few startling 3-D moments, and despite a relatively short running time, the whole thing feels like a prolonged, protracted, and downright boring exercise in this tired genre. Tries to wrap things up nice and neatly in the end, yet still can't hide the fact that this series has long run out of steam, or that this project is clearly uninspired. *½","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95447,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-10-27","keywords":"sequel,gore,female police officer,tied to a chair,husband wife relationship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw 3D: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi965151001","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNzg2OTE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTAwNTc4Mw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNzg2OTE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTAwNTc4Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Saw 3D: Trailer #2","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068551/","name":"Tobin Bell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541908/","name":"Costas Mandylor","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751018/","name":"Betsy Russell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0340436/","name":"Kevin Greutert"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247116/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247116/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733317/","name":"Patrick Melton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729303/","name":"Marcus Dunstan"],"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
Święta Last Minute
Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc:
Christmas with the Kranks: Directed by Joe Roth. With Tim Allen, Jamie Lee Curtis, Dan Aykroyd, M. Emmet Walsh. With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0388419/","name":"Christmas with the Kranks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDMxODEwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzM4OTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388419/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"terrors89"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty darn good Christmas movie full of fun.","reviewBody":"I disagree with the critics on this one. I thought Christmas with the Kranks was quite hilarious and ignored the sappy meaning of Christmas theme until the final 20 minutes. However once the movie reached that portion of the movie it slowed down painfully and left a sour taste in my mouth.

The story is pretty basic, Blair Krank, played by Julie Gonzalo (Freaky Friday,) joins the Peace Corp. and heads to Peru during the holidays for a full year. The Kranks, Luther, played by Tim Allen (The Santa Clause 1, 2) and Nora, played by Jamie Lee Curtis (Halloween, True Lies,) decide to boycott Christmas and head to the Caribbean on a cruise, much to the dismay of the neighborhood lead by Vic Frohmeyer, played by Dan Aykroyd (Ghostbusters, 50 first dates.) On Christmas Eve, Blair calls and tells her parents that she is coming home for Christmas with her boyfriend who wants to experience a true American Christmas with parties, snow and all of the trimmings. So it's a race against the clock to see if they can pull it off before she gets home.

Like I said the beginning of the movie is quite hilarious. The scenes between the Kranks and their neighbors who want them to celebrate Christmas are the funniest I have seen in a Christmas movie since Natl. Lampoon's Christmas Vacation. Luther with his Botox is just great.

However, the last 20 minutes of the movie when the Kranks are trying to get the Christmas Eve party together, with the help of the whole neighborhood, drags the movie down a lot., so much in fact that you almost forget the laughter in the first act of the movie. There is also a pointless couple of scenes with a burglar that don't make since.

I thought Tim Allen and Jaime Lee Curtis were cast perfectly for each other, all though at times Curtis reminded me of Patricia Richardson who played Allen's wife in the TV show Home Improvement. Along with Aykroyd, the supporting cast is full of very recognizable faces and some even provide humor to the story.

Overall, I say that this movie is a pretty good Christmas movie. If the last half of the movie was as funny as the first half, and if they would have ignored the whole spirit of Christmas message, this movie would have been as great as my favorite Christmas movie of all time, the afore mentioned National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation. However, since it wasn't and they didn't, this movie only gets a pretty good rating. But I still say go see and ignore the rest of those idiot reviewers and listen to me! *This movie review and others can be read at www.bbmc.dockratent.com*","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45808,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2004-11-24","keywords":"bikini,christmas,cat,singing,arrest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Christmas with the Kranks","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2092826905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTdmNTItZTQwMC00MTk5LTkyZTYtYjdjMGNkMzBkZjEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTdmNTItZTQwMC00MTk5LTkyZTYtYjdjMGNkMzBkZjEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000741/","name":"Tim Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005387/","name":"Joe Roth"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125564/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001300/","name":"John Grisham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

I thought Christmas with the Kranks was quite hilarious and ignored the sappy meaning of Christmas theme until the final 20 minutes. However once the movie reached that portion of the movie it slowed down painfully and left a sour taste in my mouth.

The story is pretty basic, Blair Krank, played by Julie Gonzalo (Freaky Friday,) joins the Peace Corp. and heads to Peru during the holidays for a full year. The Kranks, Luther, played by Tim Allen (The Santa Clause 1, 2) and Nora, played by Jamie Lee Curtis (Halloween, True Lies,) decide to boycott Christmas and head to the Caribbean on a cruise, much to the dismay of the neighborhood lead by Vic Frohmeyer, played by Dan Aykroyd (Ghostbusters, 50 first dates.) On Christmas Eve, Blair calls and tells her parents that she is coming home for Christmas with her boyfriend who wants to experience a true American Christmas with parties, snow and all of the trimmings. So it's a race against the clock to see if they can pull it off before she gets home.

Like I said the beginning of the movie is quite hilarious. The scenes between the Kranks and their neighbors who want them to celebrate Christmas are the funniest I have seen in a Christmas movie since Natl. Lampoon's Christmas Vacation. Luther with his Botox is just great.

programme.title: Hotel for Dogs
Hotel dla psów
Hotel for Dogs
programme.desc:
Hotel for Dogs: Directed by Thor Freudenthal. With Emma Roberts, Jake T. Austin, Don Cheadle, Johnny Simmons. Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0785006/","name":"Hotel for Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5NjkxOTE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTcxNTAwMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0785006/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LazySod"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good laugh for the kids","reviewBody":"A brother and sister live with their umpteenth set of foster parents. They hide their pet - a small dog - because the foster parents don't want to know about it. When the dog runs away they follow it and find their way into an old abandoned building. To their surprise it is not completely abandoned but actually lived in by a number of dogs. Soon after that an idea comes to life.

And from there the story rolls on in a typical Disney style children's film where evil is evil and good is good and anything else is easily forgotten. As as adult I wasn't overly impressed with the film but the kid I took to see it loved it - and that's good. The target audience for the film must be kids in the age range 6 to 12 or so. The things that happen are fun to watch (at least the very most of the time) and although the acting capabilities of the younger players leaves something to be desired it is not bad enough to turn the film into a complete waste of tape.

All in all, it features a good number of laughs, a few tear drops and surely a lot of hard work - and a cast that is clearly liking to play the roles they were cast for.

5 out of 10 dogs barking in the night","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2009-03-18","keywords":"overalls,male and female protagonists,older sister younger brother relationship,2000s,canadian dog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hotel for Dogs: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3092774937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0ODkwNDU5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg1NDIwMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0ODkwNDU5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg1NDIwMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of kids secretly turn a vacant hotel into a shelter for stray dogs."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731075/","name":"Emma Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1545471/","name":"Jake T. A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0775552/","name":"Aliens in the Attic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3NTMzNTIxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTI4ODU1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0775552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"grnth"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"If Kids Wrote Reviews, This'd Be Rated Higher","reviewBody":"I saw this movie with my 2 kids -- ages 3 and 9. Although I can't say I cared for it much, they LOVED it. I've never seen my daughter (the 3 year old) laugh so much or sit so still at a movie.

As a grumpy adult, I couldn't ignore the irrational plot line. My kids could care less, and they adored the clever funny dialogue and the silly slapstick comedy.

I'd strongly recommend that adults stay away. I'd also strongly recommend that anyone with kids go see it.

My rating of 8 is an average. I give it a 4, but both kids give it a 10. That averages out to an 8.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21622,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2009-09-30","keywords":"mastiff,leash,collar,muzzle,psychotronic film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Aliens in the Attic -- Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3182035481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2OTE5MTYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY5MzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2OTE5MTYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY5MzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Maine, a group of teenagers must protect their vacation home from the aliens who have taken over the top floor of the dwelling. A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0775552/","name":"Aliens in the Attic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3NTMzNTIxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTI4ODU1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0775552/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"grnth","dateCreated":"2009-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"If Kids Wrote Reviews, This'd Be Rated Higher","reviewBody":"I saw this movie with my 2 kids -- ages 3 and 9. Although I can't say I cared for it much, they LOVED it. I've never seen my daughter (the 3 year old) laugh so much or sit so still at a movie.

As a grumpy adult, I couldn't ignore the irrational plot line. My kids could care less, and they adored the clever funny dialogue and the silly slapstick comedy.

I'd strongly recommend that adults stay away. I'd also strongly recommend that anyone with kids go see it.

My rating of 8 is an average. I give it a 4, but both kids give it a 10. programme.title: Bedazzled
Zakręcony
Bedazzled
programme.desc:
Bedazzled: Directed by Harold Ramis. With Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances O'Connor, Miriam Shor. Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0230030/","name":"Bedazzled","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgxOTg5OGUtOWViMC00NjM5LWEyMTQtN2M4NTBjYWUzOWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0230030/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pachl"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A comedy with warmth, wit, and style","reviewBody":"I originally saw this movie because it stars Brendan Fraser, an actor who can't seem to make a bad movie, and often makes great movies, such as "Blast From the Past".

The big surprise was Elizabeth Hurley. As certain as Vivien Leigh was meant to play Scarlett O'Hara, no one could have done a better job playing The Devil...in this case a sly, brilliantly cunning, sexy devil who playfully torments Brendan by dooming each of his wishes with unintended, nasty surprises. She effortlessly leads him along like a puppy dog on a leash.

Besides her comedic wit, (and some clever writing) I would be remiss not to mention that Elizabeth Hurley looks perfect, absolutely perfect, in every scene. Her clipped, refined British accent is the aural equivalent of a film shot on Kodachrome.

Bedazzled exudes a positive, good-natured warmth, and is proof that comedy doesn't have to depend on silly sophomoric antics, pratfalls, or foul language.

ADDENDUM January 10, 2008. After two years, I have no idea if anyone has ever read this review. Even if you don't like it, please give me a thumbs up or thumbs down, just to let me know someone read it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100866,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-31","keywords":"gay,john wilkes booth character,soul,devil,dream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bedazzled","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2293825817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NjNDI0NTItNjQxYi00YTk2LWFhZTgtODc2YTg4YmY3YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NjNDI0NTItNjQxYi00YTk2LWFhZTgtODc2YTg4YmY3YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000409/","name":"Brendan Fraser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000167/","name":"Elizabeth Hurley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0640323/","name":"Frances O'Connor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017013/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177228/","name":"Peter Cook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001545/","name":"Dudley Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312205/","name":"Larry Gelbart"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rocky II
Rocky 2
Rocky II
programme.desc:
Rocky II: Directed by Sylvester Stallone. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079817/","name":"Rocky II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzZjQyMDgtMmQ3YS00ZDE4LWIyYTAtMWRkMWQ4ZTI5ZjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079817/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rehash that works every time and in which Balboa returns to take on Apollo Creed","reviewBody":"Officially a sequel is most a rehash but happens to be a nice second chapter about Rocky saga with intimate Stallone . Two-bit fighter Rocky now retired lives from records but our hero returns to face off a daring Apollo . Although he is homaged as one of the greatest boxing champions in the history also is panned as a down-and-out fighter , being nicknamed as the Chicken Stallion . But Rocky comes out from retirement for fame and self-respect to combat strongest, youngest and faster contender , again champion Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers)through a rematch. Apollo after being dethroned by obnoxious Rocky seeks vendetta . While Rocky attempts to prove himself and his family , his wife (Talia Shire), brother-in-law (Burt Young) and his recent born son. Then he's trained again by the veteran , feisty coach (Burguess Meredith who repeats efficiently his series role).

This agreeable predictable entertainment displays splendidly the 'formula Rocky'. The movie works at usual manner, fitting appropriately to franchise , even though we know the plot the film works . programme.title: MTV Europe Music Awards
programme.desc: Podczas wakacji Sandy (Olivia Newton-John) zakochuje się w przystojnym Dannym (John Travolta). Traf chce, że zaczyna chodzić do tej samej szkoły, co on. Niestety chłopak, który jest przywódcą młodzieżowego gangu, przy kolegach nie zwraca na nią uwagi. Rozżalona nastolatka wstępuje do konkurencyjnej bandy. Pasją obydwu grup jest taniec. Tymczasem zbliża się ważny konkurs taneczny... Adaptacja musicalu "Grease".

programme.title: Grease
Grease
programme.desc: Grease: Directed by Randal Kleiser. With John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077631/","name":"Grease","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmUyMDEyOTgtZmUwOS00NTdkLThlNzctNTM1ODQ4M2VhMjdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. Little did they know that they would be attending the same high school when going back to school. programme.title: Le divorce
Jądro Ziemi
The Core
programme.desc:
Le divorce: Directed by James Ivory. With Kate Hudson, Jean-Marie Lhomme, Naomi Watts, Esmée Buchet-Deàk. French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0306734/","name":"Le divorce","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMjQ0MDgzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjM1MDY2._V1_.jpg","description":"French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0306734/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just another movie...","reviewBody":"you wonder why they ever spent money to make. It wasn't terrible, but not much happens. It didn't entertain me. Isabel goes to Paris to visit her pregnant sister, Roxanne. Upon arriving, she sees Roxanne's husband leaving her. So, she tries to cheer her sister up and has an affair with a married relative of the husband. He buys her an expensive purse and everyone knows they're hooking up. A side plot involves a painting that belongs to Roxanne's family. She doesn't want her husband to get it in the divorce. They decide to sell it and find out it's worth millions. So, now the 2 sisters have some money to start the new chapter in their lives.

I don't think it was a romance film and it sure wasn't funny. I would describe it as bland.

French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0306734/","name":"Le divorce","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMjQ0MDgzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjM1MDY2._V1_.jpg","description":"French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0306734/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN","dateCreated":"2004-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just another movie...","reviewBody":"you wonder why they ever spent money to make. It wasn't terrible, but not much happens. It didn't entertain me. Isabel goes to Paris to visit her pregnant sister, Roxanne. Upon arriving, she sees Roxanne's husband leaving her. So, she tries to cheer her sister up and has an affair with a married relative of the husband. He buys her an expensive purse and everyone knows they're hooking up. A side plot involves a painting that belongs to Roxanne's family. She doesn't want her husband to get it in the divorce. They decide to sell it and find out it's worth millions. So, now the 2 sisters have some money to start the new chapter in their lives.

I don't think it was a romance film and it sure wasn't funny. I would describe it as bland.

programme.title: 2 Lava 2 Lantula
Lawalantula 2
2 Lava 2 Lantula!
programme.desc:
2 Lava 2 Lantula!: Directed by Nick Simon. With Steve Guttenberg, Michael Winslow, Michele Weaver, Jimmy Bellinger. Colton West must defeat the lavalantulas once again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4932244/","name":"2 Lava 2 Lantula!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA3YjRkMzctNzU4Yy00YzBiLTk1NGMtOGIyM2Q5MDQ1YjVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjE0MTEwNzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Colton West must defeat the lavalantulas once again.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4932244/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kannibalcorpsegrinder"},"dateCreated":"2016-09-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another highly enjoyable creature feature","reviewBody":"Getting his acting career back together, the movie-star-turned- spider-killer finds that his stepdaughter is among those trapped by a new outbreak of lavalantulas in Florida and gathers his friends once again as they race to save her and stop the creatures.

This here was quite the fun and enjoyably cheesy creature feature. What really tends to work well for this one is the fact that there's so much more fun cheesy action than expected here which provides this one with such a frantic pace that there's so much good times to come from this one. The first attack where they erupt on the beach is a great cheesy highlight with the formations appearing in the Florida skyline and the panic of the fleeing beach-crowds getting swarmed makes for a good time, the city-wide panic where they keep encountering the creatures in the apartment complex, at the car-depot and then the big scene with the creatures at the school while trying to re-check their supplies which introduces several big chases through the labs and classrooms trying to avoid them as their continued presence makes for a series of really enjoyable pieces that have a big impact on the film's overall pacing. That also manages to work for the rather shorter attacks throughout here that shows the spiders coming into play against the citizenry in fine form getting in the usual Sci-Fi Channel style fun and highly enjoyable encounters which manage to provide the big boost this needs to go into the finale which has the same overall fun and enjoyment with the big plan to finally take down the largest spider in the bunch which is where this one really gets quite enjoyable delivering plenty of thrilling action throughout here trying to execute their wacky plan to stop it that manages to top the exceptionally goofy and silly one from the original. That as well plays a big part of how much fun this one is as it still features the same overall attitude and tone as the first which helps to make the creatures that much more of a threat and gives the few silly lines that much more of an impact with the tone being quite consistent all the way through both. That said, there's still the one main flaw here that does tend to crop up in every single one of these films in that there's just absolutely nothing at all that realistic about the way the CGI looks in here, which is so obvious and fake that it really becomes distracting with the low-rent production getting this to look so out-of-sync with a real-life creature who fail to match their backgrounds all that accurately while managing to get the same overall grading and scene placement flaws that become prevalent and somewhat expected in these kinds of films. These, though, aren't detrimental at all and don't really tend to hold this one back too much.

Rated Unrated/R: Graphic Violence and Language.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1166,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.2},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-08-06","keywords":"fort,fortress,star,movie star,film star","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000430/","name":"Steve Guttenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935498/","name":"Michael Winslow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5142128/","name":"Michele Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2415173/","name":"Nick Simon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140089/","name":"Neil Elman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4639862/","name":"Ashley O'Neil"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wojna Światów 2021
programme.desc: Allison i jej brat Henry są astronomami. Docierają do nich groźby Marsjan, którzy zamierzają zaatakować Ziemię. Nikt nie wierzy w ich ostrzeżenia. Niebawem jednak kosmiczni najeźdźcy lądują na Błękitnej Planecie. Naukowcy odkrywają słaby punkt przybyszów - nie są oni odporni na ziemskie choroby.

A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0449487/","name":"Passengers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3ODE5MjIzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4Nzc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0449487/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"antoniotierno"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"just passable but with strong acting‏","reviewBody":"A film where only cast makes the difference, in fact without the skills of Patrick Wilson and Anne Hathaway "Passengers" would have just been a melodramatic mess. This isn't certainly a very original or scary film (although reminds a lot "The 6th Sense" and "The others"), but it's not the worst either, due to some interesting twists. Anne Hathaway is a talented actress and gets to make feel her fear and frustration. She got chemistry with Wilson and they end up being plausible by complementing one another. "Passengers" is not a movie I would strongly recommend but the shocking finale and some good acting performances make a decent (barely decent actually) choice for an evening rental.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35951,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2008-09-26","keywords":"airplane crash,survivor,explosion,afterlife,doctor patient relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Passengers: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3525836825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5NDQ0Njk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5NDQ0Njk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first theatrical trailer for Passengers, directed by Rodrigo GarcÃ­a."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001556/","name":"David Morse"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006554/","name":"Rodrigo García"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123049/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159892/","name":"Ronnie Christensen"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Merlin and the Book of Beasts
Merlin i księga bestii
Merlin and the Book of Beasts
programme.desc: Merlin and the Book of Beasts: Directed by Warren P. Sonoda. With James Callis, Laura Harris, Jesse Moss, Patrick Sabongui. Sorcerer Arkadian has taken over Camelot with a zoo of beasts from his magical book. King Arthur's daughter Avlynn asks Merlin to help her take back Camelot. She also has to find the sacred sword Excalibur to assist her as she leads a band of knights to battle Arkadian." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1320346/","name":"Merlin and the Book of Beasts","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMzUyMzA4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTYxNjg4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sorcerer Arkadian has taken over Camelot with a zoo of beasts from his magical book. King Arthur's daughter Avlynn asks Merlin to help her take back Camelot. She also has to find the sacred sword Excalibur to assist her as she leads ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1320346/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"britmike-1"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wasn't good enough","reviewBody":"The Arthur legend has led to some great movies and stories. This retelling of the story doesn't work. Not good mythology or good narrative. The script could have been pared down considerably. If Arthur is Celtic make the girl a red-head, not a Swedish blond. If Merlin is Welsh, he would have come from Noth Wales, not Swansea. What an accent. Merlin would have been more believable if he had used his beautiful spoken English. What are the Greek Gorgons doing in England, they belong in Greece. How did the sword get away from the Lady of the Lake? Try T.H. White's Once and Future King or try Geoffrey of Monmouth for better versions of this story. There is enough material in the Arthur legend without the Greek improvements. The Disney cartoon based on White was a much better story than this version.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1107,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Fantasy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-05-30","keywords":"magic book,arthurian legend,blonde,sword and sorcery,fistfight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Merlin and the Book of Beasts","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3315401241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE2Mzk2YmQtNGNkNi00NmM2LWEwMDgtYzlkZGYwNzA2NTkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE2Mzk2YmQtNGNkNi00NmM2LWEwMDgtYzlkZGYwNzA2NTkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fantasy film trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0130536/","name":"James Callis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364977/","name":"Laura Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1536605/","name":"Jesse Moss"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1284464/","name":"Warren P. programme.title: Wojna Światów 2021
programme.desc: Allison i jej brat Henry są astronomami. Docierają do nich groźby Marsjan, którzy zamierzają zaatakować Ziemię. Nikt nie wierzy w ich ostrzeżenia. Niebawem jednak kosmiczni najeźdźcy lądują na Błękitnej Planecie. Naukowcy odkrywają słaby punkt przybyszów - nie są oni odporni na ziemskie choroby.

programme.title: Nowe przygody Aladyna
programme.desc: Aladyn (Adam Hollick) jest ubogim, lecz zaradnym, młodym człowiekiem. Pewnego dnia tajemniczy czarownik powierza mu misję odnalezienia magicznej lampy z dżinem (Tionne Williams), który potrafi spełniać życzenia. Kiedy Aladyn wchodzi w je posiadanie, zamienia się w księcia w nadziei na zdobycie serca pięknej księżniczki.

Mamula: Directed by Milan Todorovic. With Kristina Klebe, Dragan Micanovic, Natalie Burn, Slobodan Stefanovic. Two young American women go on a Mediterranean vacation and uncover the watery lair of a killer mermaid hidden beneath an abandoned military fortress. What was once a carefree adventure becomes a deadly fight for survival." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3171764/","name":"Mamula","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMzQ2OTc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc0MDIzMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two young American women go on a Mediterranean vacation and uncover the watery lair of a killer mermaid hidden beneath an abandoned military fortress. What was once a carefree adventure becomes a deadly fight for survival.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3171764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty","reviewBody":"That's the best I can say about the movie. It delivers every cliché in the book and there are lines of dialog, that were openly laughed at, at the Screening at Frightfest. While director and stars are invited I always feel sort of bad for them, but it wasn't an issue at the Q&A afterwards, which was a good thing.

The actors are all pretty, but some struggle with their lines (especially those whose first language isn't English!). Franco Nero might seem like a lighthouse, but considering the demands he made to be in the movie, it might have been better, if he actually wasn't. He brings some sort of gravitas, but he has some speeches that feel endless and stop the movie entirely. Not that it was up and running in high speed, but still.

There is some nudity and blood to satisfy those needs, but it does not help make this a fun movie. programme.title: Potop Redivivus
programme.desc: Na podstawie zrekonstruowanej cyfrowo wersji filmu powstał "Potop Redivivus", czyli "Potop odrodzony", stanowiący swoistą kondensację monumentalnego dzieła. Choć oryginalny, trwający 315 minut materiał został znacznie okrojony, w nowym filmie udało się pomieścić wszystkie najważniejsze wątki narracyjne.
